# Export crosstabs to txt file and push to synapse

```{r}
load("data/phenoData.RData")

write.table(p, file="data/PTRC_Ex17_metadata.txt",
            quote=F, sep="\t")
```

```{r}
library(MSnbase)

load("data/msnset_global_gene_uncorrected.RData")
exprs(m) <- signif(exprs(m), 3)
write.table(exprs(m), file="data/PTRC_Ex17_crosstabGlobal_gene_uncorrected.txt",
            quote=F, sep="\t")

load("data/msnset_global_gene_corrected.RData")
exprs(m) <- signif(exprs(m), 3)
write.table(exprs(m), file="data/PTRC_Ex17_crosstabGlobal_gene_batchCorrected.txt",
            quote=F, sep="\t")


load("data/msnset_global_peptide_uncorrected.RData")
exprs(m) <- signif(exprs(m), 3)
write.table(exprs(m), file="data/PTRC_Ex17_crosstabGlobal_peptide_uncorrected.txt",
            quote=F, sep="\t")

load("data/msnset_global_peptide_corrected.RData")
exprs(m) <- signif(exprs(m), 3)
write.table(exprs(m), file="data/PTRC_Ex17_crosstabGlobal_peptide_batchCorrected.txt",
            quote=F, sep="\t")
```
